common.name: Name
common.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

auth.forgotPasswordSuccessGeneric: If an account exists, we will send a reset email within 10 minutes. Please wait before requesting again.
auth.forgotPasswordCooldownActive: You can request another link in {{time}}.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

loginError.serverError: Server error, please try again later
loginError.notInWhitelist: This email is not in whitelist. Registration is forbidden.

maskedLogin.noticeGuestsMasked: Masked mode is enabled for unauthenticated users.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.googleAuthInfo: Password change is not available for Google-authenticated accounts. Please use Google account settings to manage your password.

notifications.currentPasswordRequired: Enter current password to change password

blacklist.userCreateWarning: This email is in the blacklist. The user will be created but the email will be removed from the blacklist automatically.
blacklist.userWillBeRemovedFromList: After creation the email will be removed from the blacklist.
blacklist.userBlockedNow: Existing user with this email will no longer be able to log in.
blacklist.warningMessage:
Warning!
Existing user with this email will no longer be able to log in!
blacklist.warningDetails: Adding email to blacklist will block login for the user if they already exist. Are you sure you want to continue?

accessMode.title: Access Control Mode
accessMode.whitelistDescription: Only emails in whitelist can register. Blacklist blocks login.
accessMode.blacklistDescription: All emails can register except those in blacklist. Blacklist blocks both registration and login. Whitelist is ignored.
accessMode.otpSent: OTP code sent to your email
accessMode.changeModePrompt: Enter your password and OTP code to change access mode:

maskedLogin.title: Masked Login Settings
maskedLogin.description: Enable to mask login pages with fake content. Users will see a fake page instead of the login form. The actual login form is accessible via a secret link.

errors.emailAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists

admin.assignAdminPrompt: Enter your password to grant admin rights:

errors.serverError: Server error, please try again later
errors.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one digit, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one special character (@#$%^&+=!-_*?), and no spaces
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.passwordNoDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
errors.passwordNoUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.passwordNoLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.passwordNoSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character (@#$%^&+=!-_*?)

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: It looks like this page doesn't exist or has been moved.
